siteMetadata.title: Crossing the river by feeling the stones

nodes.excerpt: This short post is part of the Practical Haskell Bits initiative. Visit the repository to find out more real-world examples like this…
It happens to all of us. Once in a while you stumble upon a problem that seems way too familiar. You remember that you’ve either solved it…

frontmatter.title: The "Practical Haskell Bits" initiative
frontmatter.description: An attempt to collect and organize various real world Haskell patterns, snippets and popular library examples.
